#### About 

This web application provides an interactive interface to explore the positive predictive value of clinical trials that have shown a positive result.

#### Citation

Please cite this paper when using the results of this web application:

``` Adibi A, Sin D, Sadatsafavi M, 'Lowering the P Value Threshold Is Inappropriate for Phase 3 Randomized Clinical Trials' (Submitted to JAMA)```

#### Bug Report

Please report bugs and issues [here] (https://github.com/aminadibi/p-value-worth/issues).
